anthar wishwawidyalayiya shishya balamandalaya 2013 sita 'janatha wimukthi peramuna deshapalanayen wenwa kriya karayi.' 2015 mayi raliyedi owunge hitapu prabala nayakayin wana sanjiwa bandara,najith indikage sahaya labune peratugami samajawadi pakshayatayi.kese namuth, warthamanayedith anthar wishwawidyalayiya shishya balamandalaye sahaya labana shishya kandayam itha arthawath de wana nawa natya nirmana,nawa sangitha nirmana,nawa adahas nawa mathawada,sanwada yanadiya nawakaya lesin kriyathmaka karayi.eewa kisi witakath nawaka shishyayinta hinsakari nowe.namuth,nawaka shishyayin hata pradhana nagara wala sarisaramin kata aramudal wala yedemin awashya aramudal sapaya ganimata sidu we.eya yamthak hinsakari/karadarakari ath dakimak wiya hakiya.
